citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A facility representative was not available on 5/20/2014 between 10:30 am through 11:00 am to do a facility
inspection.
The inspector knocked on the door of the residence, honked the horn of the GOV and called the telephone number
provided with no response. The inspector waited in the driveway for over 30 minutes.
If your hours of availability have changed, please contact me.
Additional Inspectors
Osborne Stephanie, Animal Care Inspector
